title: Hundreds of malicious Python packages found stealing sensitive data
description: A malicious campaign that researchers observed growing more complex over the past half year, has been planting on open-source platforms hundreds of info-stealing packages that counted about 75,000 downloads. [...]

title: Apple emergency update fixes new zero-day used to hack iPhones
description: Apple released emergency security updates to patch a new zero-day security flaw exploited in attacks targeting iPhone and iPad users. [...]

title: Atlassian patches critical Confluence zero-day exploited in attacks
description: Australian software company Atlassian released emergency security updates to fix a maximum severity zero-day vulnerability in its Confluence Data Center and Server software, which has been exploited in attacks. [...]

title: Researchers warn of 100,000 industrial control systems exposed online
description: About 100,000 industrial control systems (ICS) were found on the public web, exposed to attackers probing them for vulnerabilities and at risk of unauthorized access. Among them are power grids, traffic light systems, security and water systems. [...]

title: Cisco fixes hard-coded root credentials in Emergency Responder
description: Cisco released security updates to fix a Cisco Emergency Responder (CER) vulnerability that let attackers log into unpatched systems using hard-coded credentials. [...]

title: Microsoft: Hackers target Azure cloud VMs via breached SQL servers
description: Hackers have been observed trying to breach cloud environments through Microsoft SQL Servers vulnerable to SQL injection. [...]

title: Enhancing your application security program with continuous monitoring
description: Pen Testing as a Service and Traditional web application pen testing offers two different approaches to securing your applications. Learn more from Outpost24 on which approach may be best for your business. [...]

title: Sony confirms data breach impacting thousands in the U.S.
description: Sony Interactive Entertainment (Sony) has notified current and former employees and their family members about a cybersecurity breach that exposed personal information. [...]

title: Emergency alert on US phones and TVs today — Don’t worry, it’s just a test
description: The U.S. Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) and the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) will run an emergency alert test today to check Emergency Alert System (EAS) and Wireless Emergency Alerts (WEA) capabilities nationwide. [...]
